item.title: Busscar Vissta Buss 365 NB 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | February 12, 2025

Busscar Vissta Buss 365 NB 1.53 ETS2

The Busscar Vissta Buss 365 NB in Euro Truck Simulator 2 is a mod that introduces a realistic and detailed bus model into the game. This bus, inspired by the real-life Brazilian-made Busscar Vissta Buss 365, offers players the opportunity to experience passenger transport alongside the traditional trucking gameplay. The mod typically features high-quality textures, customizable options, and realistic handling, making it a popular choice for players who enjoy diversifying their in-game experience. It’s a great addition for those looking to explore the bus-driving aspect within the ETS2 universe.

Credits: equipe pa

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Big Lightbox for SCS Volvo FH4/5/6 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | February 12, 2025

Big Lightbox for SCS Volvo FH4/5/6 v1.0 ETS2

Summary:
– This mod adds a highly detailed big overhead lightbox for the stock Volvo FH4, FH5 and FH6.
– The lightbox is available for the Globetrotter XL Cabins (FH4, FH5 and FH6) and for the Globetrotter XXL Cabins (FH6), it is skinnable and paintable, and it has many slots for addons and accessories.
– There are 3 variants of the lightbox for each truck, one with no side brackets, one with side brackets and one with a paintable roof bar.
– The lightbox and its parts were completely built from scratch.
– The roof bar is an SCS model, but it has been re-textured and made paintable.

Accessory names for skinning:
acc_list[]: “r_grill.az_lt_box1” (lightbox with no side brackets)
acc_list[]: “r_grill.az_lt_box2” (lightbox with side brackets)
acc_list[]: “r_grill.az_lt_box3” (lightbox with roof bar)

Notes:
– Tested on 1.53.x
– The light in the lightbox turns on with parking lights.

Credits: jake_azazel83

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Tecnobus Tribus 2 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | February 12, 2025

Tecnobus Tribus 2 1.53 ETS2

The Tecnobus Tribus 2 in Euro Truck Simulator 2 is a mod that adds a detailed and realistic bus model to the game, inspired by the real-life Italian minibus manufactured by Tecnobus. This compact and versatile vehicle is perfect for players who want to explore passenger transport in urban or rural environments. The mod typically includes high-quality textures, customizable features, and accurate handling, providing an immersive experience for those looking to diversify their gameplay beyond traditional trucking. It’s a great choice for players interested in smaller-scale transport operations within ETS2.

item.title: Marcopolo Paradiso G7 1800 DD Scania 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | February 12, 2025

Marcopolo Paradiso G7 1800 DD Scania 1.53 ETS2

The Marcopolo Paradiso G7 1800 DD Scania in Euro Truck Simulator 2 is a highly detailed bus mod that brings the iconic Brazilian-made coach into the game. Known for its luxurious design and long-distance comfort, this double-decker bus is based on the Scania chassis, offering players a realistic and immersive passenger transport experience. The mod typically features high-quality textures, customizable options, and accurate handling, making it a popular choice for players who enjoy exploring the bus-driving aspect of ETS2. It’s perfect for virtual travelers looking to operate long-haul routes in style.

item.title: Mercedes Benz AXOR 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | February 12, 2025

Mercedes Benz AXOR 1.53 ETS2

The Mercedes-Benz AXOR in Euro Truck Simulator 2 is a mod that introduces a realistic version of the popular medium-duty truck into the game. Known for its versatility and reliability, the AXOR is designed for regional transport and distribution tasks. In ETS2, this mod typically features high-quality textures, customizable options, and accurate handling, allowing players to experience the truck’s performance in various logistics scenarios. It’s a great addition for players who enjoy a mix of urban and short-to-medium haul trucking within the game.

Credits: fernando gamer
